name: Capture the snowcity
description:
This game is created for Trijam #207.

Week from 19th to 25th is old russian festival named "Maslenitza".  In this week we eat a lot of pancakes and play some snow games. One of them - the capture of snow city. There is 2 teams: defenders and attackers. Defenders defend the snow city, attackers attack it. 

I have made this game. Here the player is defender. You lose if you touch the attacker or the attacker touches the snow city.  You can kill the attackers using snowballs, which you can collect near the city and throw to the cursor. Also your goal is to collect as much pancakes as you can. Pancakes drops from the attackers.

Controls:

Walking: A-D.

Jumping: Space

Collecting snowballs: Q

Throwing snowballs: E
